game4.title: Cat Game
game4.subtitle: Motion control game
game4.description: This motion control game is about guiding the cats into the green portals by tilting your device. Once each cat has entered a portal the level ends, and the player is awarded a score. This game contains some mild violence, but is generally deemed appropriate to all ages. This is my very first published game. This game was created using LibGDX and Box2D.

game3.title: Game Station

game3.description: A cooperative project practicing basic Java. The collection contains a circuit hacker game (where the goal is to complete the circuit), a Hangman game, a simple child-friendly memory game, the classical Minesweeper and also Tetris
